'''Duncan Geere''' is a writer, editor and data journalist who wrote parts of the minecraft.net series "Block of the Month" and "Block of the Week", from the 21st episode to the last. This was continued in 2020 with [[scaffolding]], [[honey]], [[target]], and [[basalt]],<ref>{{Mcnet|block-week-note-block|Block of the Week: Note Block|June 1, 2018|Duncan Geere}}</ref><ref>https://tinyletter.com/duncangeere/letters/s03e19-blocks s03e19: Blocks, by Duncan Geere</ref><ref>https://www.duncangeere.com/portfolio/blockoftheweek/ Block of the Week: A series for the official Minecraft website, covering every block in the game, by Duncan Geere</ref> with the last one being the [[Smoker]].<ref>{{Mcnet|block-week--smoker|Block of the Week: Smoker|July 22, 2022|Duncan Geere}}</ref>{{verify}} He also currently writes the "Taking Inventory", "Around The Block" and other series in minecraft.net. In 2010, Duncan wrote an article for Wired UK about his first experience playing ''Minecraft''.<ref>https://www.wired.com/2010/09/minecraft/</ref>
